entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:53 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Plains 11:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening and after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
